info.title: SustainableMe
info.description: The API Endpoints for the SustainableMe website

post.description: This allows the user to enter their login credentials (username and password) and from the username, it will get the users password.
This allows the admin to enter their login credentials (username and password) and from the username, it will get the admin's password.
This allows users to create a new account by entering their username, first name, last name, email and password. It will then generate a userId for the user.
This allows admins to create a new account by entering their username, first name, last name, email and password. It will then generate a adminId for the admin.

get.description: This gets all the categories from the SQL database to then be displayed on the screen.
This gets the specific category when the user clicks on the category.
This gets all the weeks from the SQL database.

post.description: This lets the user create a new week and saves it into the SQL database.

get.description: This gets the weeks for the specific category and user from the SQL database and displays the weeks for that user on the screen in the different categories.

put.description: This allows the user to update the week name and saves it into the SQL database.

delete.description: This allows the user to delete the week and updates the SQL database.

get.description: This gets all the datainputs from the SQL database.

post.description: This allows the user to create new datainputs and saves it into the SQL database.

get.description: This gets the datainputs by the specific weekName, catId, userId and dataId from the SQL database to display when the user clicks on the specific datainput.

put.description: This allows the user to update the datainput info, amount and date, and saves it into the SQL database.

delete.description: This allows the user to delete the datainput and updates the SQL database.

get.description: This gets the datainputs by the specific weekName, catId and userId from the SQL database and displays the datainputs for that user in the specific week.
This gets the saved chat history for the specific user from the SQL database and displays it when the user clicks on the load chat button.

post.description: This allows he user to create chat history and save it into the SQL database.
This creates the Gemini AI response to the user's prompt.

get.description: This allows the user and admin to get all locations currently in the database.
This alows an admin to view the information related to the specific location by locationReqId they want to update for the database

post.description: This allows the user to create a new location request that will be sent to the database for an admin to review.

put.description: This allows an admin to update a specific location in the database, whether to approve or reject a request submitted by a user.

delete.description: This allows an admin to delete a location request from the database.

get.description: This allows admins and users to view all events currently in the database.
This allows admins and users to view the specific event by eventId from the database.

post.description: This allows an admin to create a new sustainability related event to add into the database, which wi

put.description: This allows an admin to update a specific event in the database with any new information they may have about the event.

delete.description: This allows an admin to delete a specific event from the database.

get.description: This gets all the challenges from the Challenges table in the SQL database
This gets the specific challenge by the ChallengeID from the Challenge table in the SQL Database

delete.description: This allows users to delete a challenge from the Challenge table in the SQL Database

post.description: This allows an admin to create a challenge and add it to the Challenge table in the SQL Database

get.description: This allows the user to get all the challenges and their completion status saved under their userId in the UserWeeklyChallenge table in the SQL Database

put.description: This allows user to update the sppecific ChallengeCompleted status of a challenge under their UserId in the UserWeeklyChallenges table in the SQL Database

delete.description: This allows an admin to delete a challenge from the UserWeeklyChallenges for all users in the SQL Database

post.description: This allows an admin to create a challenge and add it to the UserWeeklyChallenge table in the SQL Database

get.description: This allows users to get all the WeeklyPoints of every user in the WeeklyPoints table in the SQL Database
This allows users to get all the MonthlyPoints of every user in the MonthlyPoints table in the SQL Database

put.description: This allows admins to reset all weekly points of all users in the WeeklyPoints table in the SQL Database
This allows admins to reset all monthly points of all users in the MonthlyPoints table in the SQL Database
This allows users to add or subtract points to their corresponding user weekly points in the WeeklyPoints table in the SQL Database
This allows users to add or subtract points to their corresponding useer monthly points in the MonthlyPoints table in the SQL Database

get.description: This allows users to get their specific WeeklyPoints in the WeeklyPoints table in the SQL Database
This allows users to get their specific MonthlyPoints in the MonthlyPoints table in the SQL Database
This gets all user information (username, first name, last name, email, password)
This gets all user information (username, first name, last name, email, password) by their userId

put.description: This allows users to update their personal information (firstname, lastname, username, email, password)

delete.description: The allows users to delete their account, and account data.

get.description: This get all sustainable shopping requests.
This gets all sustainable shopping request that a specific user have submitted and shows the status.
This gets all users eco tracker submissions and records.
This gets a specific user's eco tracker submissions and records.
This gets all admin accounts information
This gets a specific admin account information

put.description: This allows admins to update their personal information (excluding their adminId)

delete.description: This allows admin to delete their account and all their account data.

get.description: This gets the status of the sustainable shopping request done by the admin
